de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities

Class DatabaseUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.DatabaseUtil

  • public final class DatabaseUtil
extends Object
    Class with Database-related utility functions such as centroid computation, covariances etc.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
